short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you to upload content to the cloud and get a url link to share or use in developing applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uploo lets you upload your content, images, videos, pdfs, and other files to the cloud directly through the extension. You can share uploaded files with people around the world. This URL also act as a CDN to serve in your web-based, mobile, or any developing applications.
